content: broken rib knit earwarmer by kelly sartori introduction materials yarn we have all seen the cc style hats that are all the rage i love -------- mine and when making myself one recently i thought how cool worsted weight yarn it would be to have an ear warmer in this style i love style as it yarn used in sample is eddie bauer yarn from joann s adds textured while the ribbing makes it fit securely on your head difficulty level gauge ----------------------- ------------------ beginner skills required/techniques used sizes ----------------------------------------------- ------------------ young adult adult working in the round working in the round with circular needles or dpns casting on finished measurements binding off ------------------ twisted rib knit 1 through back loop purl knit purl make sure to share your work on ravelry and social media tag pattern @lazycatfibers when posting designer name- kelly sartori with us 6 4 00mm 16-inch circular needle or double www lazycatfibers com pointed needles cast on 76 stitches and join in round https //www ravelry com/designers/kelly-sartori making sure not to twist the stitches email- ksartori32@gmail com work 8 row of twisted rib- knit one through the back loop purl one switch to us 8 5 00mm 16-inch circular needle kelly sartori lazycatfibers is a knit and crochet designer that loves all kinds of fibers arts as well as hanging out with friends knit 2 rnds and family occasionally she will do a little gaming and reading on her kindle purl 4 rnds knit 2 rnds copyright 4 rnds of knit 1 purl 1 rib knit 2 rnds purl 4 rnds ------------------ knit 2 rnds c @kelly sartori all rights reserved no portions of this switch to us 6 4 mm 16-inch circular needle and work pattern may be published sold or posted online without twisted rib for 8 rnds written consent you may sell any item made from this pattern bind off loosely however please give credit to the designer weave in ends and wear your near broken rib ear warmer
